data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Koriya, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Koriya, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Koriya.

data.section_summary: On average, 139 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Koriya, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Koriya that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Koriya, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Saonta people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Saonta people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Saonta people is yours.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Koriya.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 7,248 believers in Koriya against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the county of Koriya, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 658,900.

We estimate Koriya has 7,248 people who might know Jesus, 7,995 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 643,657 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Koriya, Chhattisgarh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
